scripts.cy:open: npx cypress open --env allure=true --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/*.js --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run: DEBUG=allure-plugin* npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/*.js --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cy:cucumber:run: DEBUG=allure-plugin* npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/*.feature,excludeSpecPattern=*.js --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.allure:history: mv -f allure-report/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report || true
